title: Royal Gel
summaries: The Royal Gel is an accessory that pacifies most slimes when equipped, causing them to no longer pursue the player, and will deal no contact damage or fire projectiles, even if the player deals damage to them. The Royal Gel is always dropped from King Slime's Treasure Bag in Expert Mode.
This does not apply to the following slimes:

• King Slime and his Spiked Slimes, though the normal Blue Slimes that King Slime spawns remain docile.
  • Queen Slime and her Bouncy Slimes, Crystal Slimes, and Heavenly Slimes.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
